Text: thank you, mr crane, i read lots    of this stuff ( the novels) when i was a kid.. so cheers for the  ul's. love your work..... i spilt cider on my keyboard, so that's my excuse for the poor typing. thanks agaIN, KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK.
always loved Morrcock's tales of the eternal champion in all his incarnations!  Thanks very much for these!

Thanks for the ul, Ichthypod_Crane!

To those of you whom are wondering about Elric: Stormbringer - Check out the Michael Moorcock's Eternal Champion (or Michael Moorcock Comics) torrent(s).

Will have loads of Moorcock goodness, such as Elric: The Making of a Sorcerer, Michael Moorcock's Multiverse.

Elric: Stormbringer was published by Dark Horse/Topps. Elric: The Balance Lost was done by BOOM! 

FYI!  ;-)
Nice one. Thanks for the upload.
